title: The Magic Path
description: Jimmy and his talking flute Freddy find a magic boat which takes them to Living Island where they meet H.R. Pufnstuf. Witchiepoo who had sent the boat because she wants to own the magic flute captures Jimmy, Freddy and Pufnstuf. With the help of Judy Frog they escape from the witch's castle. When Jimmy finds the magic path which leads off Living Island he and Freddy try to escape but Witchiepoo intercepts them and destroys the path.

title: The Wheely Bird
description: Freddie the Flute gives himself up to Witchiepoo thinking that she will then allow Jimmy to escape Living Island so H.R. Pufnstuf, Jimmy, Cling and Clang get a Wheelie Bird from Dr. Blinkey and using it like the Trojan horse infiltrate Witchiepoo's castle to rescue Freddie.

title: Show Biz Witch
description: Ludicrous Lion has a supersonic pogo stick which Jimmy wishes to buy to escape the island. As he doesn't have enough buttons to buy it Pufnstuf and Jimmy decide to put on a stage show to raise the money.

title: The Mechanical Boy
description: When Jimmy tries to steal Witchiepoo's boat she catches him and turns him into a robot programmed to steal Freddie.

title: Box Kite Kaper
description: Ludicrous Lion holds a kite flying contest and Pufnstuf plans to use the contest to build a kite large enough to fly Jimmy and Freddy to freedom.

title: The Golden Key
description: Ludicrous Lion gives Jimmy a map to the golden key which opens a magical door that will allow Jimmy to escape. Witchiepoo interferes and Pufnstuf ends up in the witch's dungeon.

title: The Birthday Party
description: Witchiepoo invites herself to Jimmy's surprise birthday party and steals the flute by rendering the partygoers helpless with laughing gas.

title: The Horse with the Golden Throat
description: Freddy is mistaken for a carrot and accidentally swallowed.

title: The Stand-in
description: When Shirley (Mayor Pufnstuf's sister) comes to Living Island to make a movie, Jimmy and Freddie get parts in it. Together they hatch a plot to get Witchiepoo into the movie so that Jimmy can steal her Vroom Broom to escape.

title: You Can't Have Your Cake
description: Witchiepoo hides in a cake to steal Freddy.

title: Dinner for Two Please Orson
description: An attempt to use a time machine to escape from the island goes awry.

title: Flute, Book and Candle
description: Freddy gets turned into a mushroom.

title: A Tooth for a Tooth
description: Witchiepoo has a toothache, and Dr. Blinky has an anti-witch potion.

title: The Visiting Witch
description: Witchiepoo prepares for the Boss Witch's visit to Living Island.

title: The Almost Election of Mayor Witchiepoo
description: Witchiepoo runs for mayor, with magical help.

title: Whaddya Mean the Horse Gets the Girl?
description: A movie is being made on Living Island, and Witchiepoo wants a movie of her own.
